Placed to the side of the room, a large marble table with gilded copper legs provides ample working space.

node.name: Don't Spill The Tea, Gazebo
node.description: Freshly painted beams create a spacious octagonal enclosure, leaving plenty of room between tea tables draped with pistachio cloths and high-backed chairs tied with peach bows. Porcelain tea settings and three-tiered stands offer decadent fare to the patrons.

node.name: Limited Treasures, Sales Floor
node.description: Polished to a gleam, dark metal covers the walls, ceiling, and floor save for a spot in the very center of the room where a silversteel stand sits upon a white velvet rug trimmed in silver. A steel candle-covered chandelier is suspended exactly above it, the lights glimmering across all the metal surfaces.

node.name: Two Doors Down, Salesroom
node.description: Pale cream walls are trimmed with matching painted baseboards and crown molding, giving a subtle warmth to the shop. That radiance is enhanced by the oil lamps hanging from the ceiling. The expensive merchandise is displayed on hinged mounts, allowing purchasers to examine each offering on both sides.

node.name: Capture the Bag, Shop
node.description: Planks of weathered driftwood line the walls although there are a number of gaps between the slabs. Everything has a ramshackle look except for the merchandise offered on the driftwood displays covering the bare earth floor.

node.name: Sumptuous Silks, Main Showroom
node.description: The walls of this octagonal room are covered with eight panels of thick rice paper, held in place by bamboo frames. Thousands of folds made into each piece of paper create a hazy visual effect in the masterful paintings of sunset upon the Lake of Tears, rendered in vivid watercolors. A dramatic marbled gaethzen orb hangs overhead, reflected by the polished metal of the dome above. Mannequins are arranged neatly around the area.

node.name: Sumptuous Silks, Bamboo Room
node.description: Long strips of bamboo cover the walls and frame the doorway in and out of this room. Layers of reed and cork mats line the floor here, in an apparent effort to create a quiet atmosphere. Arranged neatly around the room are some dragonwood mannequins with a marble pedestal in the center and a lacquered rack standing along one wall. A dramatic marbled gaethzen orb hangs overhead, the pale glow illuminating everything with soft light.

node.name: ArtSea Gifts and Souvenirs, Main Room
node.description: Although as tiny inside as it appeared from the outside, this diminutive shop is bursting with merchandise. Shelves line the walls and racks are stuffed into every corner. Hooks hanging from the ceiling allow for even the narrow aisleways to display wares for the discriminating tourist.

node.name: Hot Tropics, Sunkissed Sands
node.description: Sunlight streams through the avodire-framed windows and open doorway of this spacious room, highlighting the colorful shells arranged in an intricate swirl across the tall walls. A tufted rug is stretched over the mottled yellow wooden floorboards. Colorful sundresses and sarongs hang on metal racks arranged around the room.

node.name: Hot Tropics, Shifting Seas
node.description: White cumulus clouds painted along the top of the bright sky-blue walls shimmer under the warm candlelight like fluffy tufts of cotton caught on an errant sea breeze. The pale yellow ayabere floors are polished to a high shine to best display the wood's natural mottling. Various wares are displayed atop a trio of tables in the middle of the room.

node.name: Salvage Finds of the Reshal Sea, Shop Floor
node.description: Fashioned from an upturned ironwood galley once wrecked along the sea floor, the vessel has been repurposed into a freestanding structure using reclaimed oaken driftwood nailed to the hull. Gaethzen lamps dangle from closed portholes, swaying freely.

node.name: The Naked Sheep, Woolly Wears
node.description: Fluffy and soft, swaths of thick cream-colored fleece coat every side of the cozy room. The theme continues along the floor in the form of a puffy black carpet that stretches underneath several trunks and chests full of goods for sale. Warm but not stifling, the air holds a faint musty scent from all the fabric, which the merchant has apparently tried to smother with dozens of freshly potted flowers placed in the room's corners.

node.name: The Naked Sheep, Fuzzy Fluff
node.description: Puffy as a cloud, the fleece along the walls retains its natural beige hue, arranged in swaths that drape casually along the slanting sides of the homely nook. The woolly black carpet extends into this section of the tent as well, lining the floor beneath a collection of opened boxes. Stationed in one corner is a brass sheep sculpture with a look of embarrassment on its face, the surface of its skin cleanly smooth to mimic its strikingly shorn real life counterparts.

node.name: A Second Round, Tent
node.description: Dingy canvas walls encircle a floor of uneven pine planks. A few spots of mold or mildew spread across the fabric, adding a note of mustiness to the still air. A few battered tables hold the merchandise which is heaped up with no sign of organization.

node.name: Tighten Up!, Salesfloor
node.description: Bare whitewashed walls accentuate the wild colors and patterns of the merchandise displayed on shelves and counters. A few free-standing racks in the center of the room hold more wares for the milling customers to peruse and purchase.

node.name: Clothes By Any Other Flame, Showroom
node.note: Clothes by Any Other Flame|Any Other Flame
node.description: The canvas walls are painted a brilliant red, similar to the shade of a leaping flame. The wooden racks and shelves that hold the merchandise are colored in the same hue, while the floor is planks of broad pine. Helpful salespeople circulate through the crowds, answering questions and making sales.

node.name: Trees Four Walls, Showroom
node.description: Large mockups of walls hang from the rafters, allowing the patrons to view the various offerings from a variety of distances. The deep pile carpet on the floor muffles most sounds, helping to foster the mood of quiet contemplation amongst the shoppers. The saleshelp unobtrusively circulates and are ready to answer questions or place orders.

node.name: Inkspressions, Written Wonders
node.description: Pale green walls stenciled with twining ivy enclose this spacious room, and a deep blue rug covers the majority of its goldenoak floor. Gaethzen lanterns hang from the ceiling to illuminate the tables and stands displaying wares for sale.

node.name: A Walk on the Wild Side, Salesroom
node.description: Random splashes of variegated colors cover the paneled walls, brightening the room with vivid hues. Simple shoe racks made from polished woods are stationed about the room, allowing easy inspection of the wares. More shoes are displayed on a pine shoe tree positioned in the middle of the wooden flooring.

node.name: Arachnomancy, Advent
node.description: Surprisingly roomy, this wagon is the most spacious of the three, providing ample room for dramatic demonstrations. Spidersilk tapestries drape the wooden walls, concealing the patina of age. Doorways to the east and west provide access to the adjacent wagons.

node.name: Arachnomancy, Incantation
node.description: A constellation of tiny gaethzen spiders provides just enough light to see, while heavy spidersilk carpets muffle the footsteps of customers and onlookers.

node.name: Arachnomancy, Departure
node.description: Gaethzen spiders dangle from the ceiling, perhaps providing a little too much illumination. The walls are shrouded by thick sheets of spidersilk, each of which is crawling with thousands of tiny spiders.

node.name: Accents for the Arachnophile, Jewels and Accessories
node.description: At first glance, this room appears to be nothing more than the den of a giant, demented spider. The wan light of a single gaethzen lantern dangling from a chain in the ceiling illuminates somber metal walls festooned with a drapery of webbing. Thick curtains of the silky white strands droop low from the ceiling, making it difficult to navigate without becoming entangled. Fortunately, the webs are only slightly sticky and refuse to cling excessively to those brave enough to enter.

node.name: Accents for the Arachnophile, Clothe and Carry
node.description: At first glance, this room appears to be nothing more than the den of a giant, demented spider. The wan light of a single gaethzen lantern dangling from a chain in the ceiling illuminates somber metal walls festooned with a drapery of webbing. Thick curtains of the silky white strands droop low from the ceiling, making it difficult to navigate without becoming entangled. Fortunately, the webs are only slightly sticky and refuse to cling excessively to those brave enough to enter.

node.name: Accents for the Arachnophile, Offense and Defense
node.description: At first glance, this room appears to be nothing more than the den of a giant, demented spider. The wan light of a single gaethzen lantern dangling from a chain in the ceiling illuminates somber metal walls festooned with a drapery of webbing. Thick curtains of the silky white strands droop low from the ceiling, making it difficult to navigate without becoming entangled. Fortunately, the webs are only slightly sticky and refuse to cling excessively to those brave enough to enter.

node.name: Accents for the Arachnophile, Hearth and Home
node.description: At first glance, this room appears to be nothing more than the den of a giant, demented spider. The wan light of a single gaethzen lantern dangling from a chain in the ceiling illuminates somber metal walls festooned with a drapery of webbing. Thick curtains of the silky white strands droop low from the ceiling, making it difficult to navigate without becoming entangled. Fortunately, the webs are only slightly sticky and refuse to cling excessively to those brave enough to enter.

node.name: To The Hammer Born, Salesfloor
node.description: Racks and stands displaying the merchandise are scattered across the plain plank floor. The hide walls of the tent occasionally move slightly in the breeze, but little else disturbs the customers as they browse the selection of weapons on offer.

node.name: Everlasting Beauty, Foyer
node.description: Clean and inviting, this spacious beauty shop reflects a magical merging of nature's beauty and versatility. Durian wood flooring and smooth peach walls encompass the vast room. The large mirror affixed to the wall allows the shoppers a place to admire their beauty. A sizeable handmade tapestry on one wall depicts a colorful forest. Goldwood furniture pieces fill the room displaying a wide variety of cosmetics and supplies. An intricately carved door leads outside while a small arch leads to another room.

node.name: Everlasting Beauty, Parlor
node.description: Clean and inviting, this spacious beauty shop reflects a magical merging of nature's beauty and versatility. Durian wood flooring and amber walls encompass the vast room. The large mirror affixed to the wall allows the shoppers a place to admire their beauty. Goldwood furniture pieces fill the room displaying a wide variety of hair and beauty supplies. A small arch leads back to the main room.

node.name: The Dolefaren, Common Room
node.description: The dim interior of the ship is lit by scattered brass lanterns hanging along the walls. A Merelew woman with green hair and silver scales serves the delicacies of her people to the restaurant's guests at several wood tables.

node.name: Affair of the Art, Salesfloor
node.description: Except for the colors provided by the merchandise, the room is an unrelieved white - white walls, white floors, white ceilings, and white counter. Large empty spaces between the artworks allow for each piece to be properly appreciated without distractions from other works. Gaethzen globes provide a steady and safe lighting for all the wares.

node.name: Fit to be Tied, Shop
node.description: Except for the canvas walls and the wooden racks, this narrow space is lacking in decoration. The only color comes from the brilliant shades of the merchandise on the racks scattered about.

node.name: Tool as a Cucumber, Forging Supplies
node.description: Sea green silk walls enclose the room, which is floored in wide planks painted a matching shade of green. Cream-colored rugs cover the floor upon which scattered racks, tables, and shelves stand displaying the merchandise.

node.name: Tool as a Cucumber, Engineering Supplies
node.description: Forest green silk walls enclose the room, which is floored in wide planks painted a matching shade of green. Alabaster-colored rugs cover the floor upon which scattered racks, tables, and shelves stand displaying the merchandise.

node.name: Tool as a Cucumber, Dyes
node.description: Multi-colored silk walls enclose the room, which is floored in wide oaken planks. Various colored bins are scattered around the room, showing the multitude of dyes available for purchase.

node.name: Tool as a Cucumber, Enchanting Supplies
node.description: Jade green silk walls enclose the room, which is floored in wide planks painted a matching shade of green. Bone-colored rugs cover the floor upon which scattered racks, tables, and shelves stand displaying the merchandise.

node.name: Tool as a Cucumber, Alchemy Supplies
node.description: Olive green silk walls enclose the room, which is floored in wide planks painted a matching shade of green. Ivory-colored rugs cover the floor upon which scattered racks, tables, and shelves stand displaying the merchandise.

node.name: Tool as a Cucumber, Outfitting Supplies
node.description: Moss green silk walls enclose the room, which is floored in wide planks painted a matching shade of green. Snow-colored rugs cover the floor upon which scattered racks, tables, and shelves stand displaying the merchandise.

node.name: Siegery Shop, Soldiers
node.description: Detailed maps of Ilithi's different roads and towns are painted on the walls. The largest map depicts the city of Shard and the deep blue of the lake around it. Two long tables of polished wood fill the floor space, while a thick black rug spreads from corner to corner.

node.name: Siegery Shop, Castles and Cases
node.description: Rendered in precise detail upon the walls are maps of Therengia's cities and towns. Stately Therenborough takes up a whole wall, complete with an inner view of The Keep's hallways and rooms. A trio of black tables rest upon a matching rug.

node.name: Tower of Terror, Shop
node.description: Sturdy racks and stands holding the merchandise are scattered around the shopfloor. Careful lighting throws spotlights on the various items and draws attention to the exquisite craftsmanship on display.

node.name: Familiar Treats, Inside
node.description: Blocks of glittering sand create a boxy room with an inviting, open space. Starglass sconces have been strategically positioned to highlight sales displays spaced around the room.

node.name: In The Snow, Outerwear
node.description: Plain white wainscotting runs along the walls, dividing the white plastered top from the blue painted bottom. Oak planks provide the floor which has a number of racks painted in various shades of blue scattered across it. Iron sconces hold gaethzen spheres which illuminate the room and the merchandise displayed on the racks.

node.name: Gift Me Up, Shop
node.description: A multitude of shelves and racks hold a variety of merchandise and goods for sale. The whole shop is stuffed with items and the floor is piled with baskets and bins of overflow items.

node.name: The Pink Pirate's Plunder and Pillage Palace, Anteroom
node.description: Done in many shades of pink, the room is a riot of shades and tones, with the walls painted a dark rose shade that clashes with the brilliant petal pink of the floors. Standing in the middle of the room is a mannequin dressed in an outrageous outfit composed of piratical garb in a range of hues, but all of them variations of one color - pink.

node.name: The Pink Pirate's Plunder and Pillage Palace, Weapons etc.
node.description: Pine planks painted a pulsating shade of pink cover the walls and the floor is painted the palest of rosy hues. Standing throughout the room are a few stands and weapon racks displaying the merchandise.

node.name: The Pink Pirate's Plunder and Pillage Palace, Clothing
node.description: Racks and shelves cover the walls and floors, displaying a variety of garb and garments. Stands and counters display accessories for purchase.

node.name: Granny's Knot Spot, Cozy Shop
node.description: A rocking chair sits next to the fireplace, a basket of knitting beside it on the floor. The whitewashed stone walls hold wooden shelves while some wooden racks and stands are scattered about the floor.

node.name: Unique-corn, Salesfloor
node.description: Oak shelving lines the walls, displaying the varied wares of the shop. Globes filled with gaethzen dangle from the ceiling, providing illumination for the customers. Clerks bustle about refreshing the merchandise supply and answering shoppers' questions.

node.name: Bought The Farm, Front Room
node.description: Broad planks cover the walls, their surfaces and edges only roughly finished. Bits of straw are strewn across the floor, escapees from the bales used to display some of the shop's wares. More planks are cobbled together with some poles to form a rickety shelf that displays further merchandise.

node.name: A Quick Bite, Salesroom
node.description: Something keeps this room perpetually chilly, almost the temperature of an icehouse on a summer day. Gleaming metal walls contrast with the warmth of the hand-polished wooden racks displaying the shop's wares. A butcher block counter stands in one corner.

node.name: Glam and Gritty, Anteroom
node.description: Elegant ebony cabinets display wares behind slightly grimy glass doors. The polished wood of the floors shines through the occasional patch of scuffing that really could use some cleaning. A brass and glass chandelier hangs from the ceiling, its perfection only slightly marred by a small spiderweb run between two of the candleholders.

node.name: Glam and Gritty, Main Floor
node.description: The dark ebony floors contrast with the pale, almost white, wood of the birch paneling on the walls. Matching ebony shelves are set slightly askew on the walls, almost as if the builders were in too much of a hurry to actually make sure they were level. A few dust bunnies lurk in the corners, having escaped the lackluster cleaning of the salesforce.

node.name: Glam and Gritty, Alcove
node.description: Tucked into a corner are a couple of brooms, the dust and cobwebs covering them a mute testimony to how little use they see. A few scuffed storage boxes litter the floor, the lids leaning against them while they spill packing straw around the floor.

node.name: Wally's World of Walls, Salesfloor
node.description: Plain pine planks form the interior walls of this minimalist showroom. The deliberate lack of decoration throughout the room is designed to emphasize the exotic woods and flamboyant patterns of the merchandise samples displayed throught the store.

node.name: Sleepwalkers, Salesroom
node.description: Soft flannel drapes and plush cushions surround the area, inviting patrons to curl up for a nap after putting on their new purchases. Piles of folded pajamas in assorted patterns and colors mound over a large, padded table, while two baskets nearby are full of fluffy foot coverings. A padded shelf hangs on the wall, opposite the curtain.

node.name: Hero To Go, Supplies
node.description: Maps, sketches and paintings from all over Elanthia cover the plastered walls. One wall is entirely taken up by a mural of an erupting volcano while a large model of a mechanical dragon hangs from the ceiling. Opposite the mural, a gilded frame displays pressed phofe flower specimens next to a very large sign.

node.name: Hero To Go, Clothing
node.description: Unlike the first room of the shop, this one is bare of anything but merchandise and the displays for the merchandise. Plastered walls hold some shelves and hooks, while the floor is crowded with racks and stands for wares.

node.name: Natural Beauty, Sales Floor
node.description: Thick tapestries depicting a dense, wild forest surrounding a picturesque glade cover the walls, each blending seamlessly into the next. The tall ceiling painted to resemble a cloudless summer sky features a gaethzen sun positioned directly in the center. Polished driftwood furniture set up around the room displays a wide variety of garments available for sale.

node.name: Natural Beauty, Special Occasions
node.description: Smooth metal walls painted to resemble a nighttime garden seem to almost disappear beneath the layered colors. Swirled blues and purples adorn the blackened ceiling, fading down to brush the tops of the foliage with their velvety embrace. Tiny, glowing pieces of gaethzen dot the mural, from fireflies amongst the flowers to stars laboriously placed to recreate constellations, providing a diffuse but adequate source of light by which to examine the shop's surfaces. A stylish aybere jewelry case and polished driftwood counter display a wide range of goods for sale.

node.name: Altered Reactions
node.description: The aroma of analgesic ointments and smelling salts waft all around you, testament to the 'research' that occurs under this enterprise. Hanging curtains separate the room into private testing chambers, though the sounds of hands clapping against faces and the elicited response are muted by cleverly arrayed wall coverings. A series of locked doors line one wall, and attendants rush about soothing bruised faces and egos.

node.name: Killer Pinks, Fatally Aggressive
node.description: Coralite lanterns dangle freely from petalette cords strung across the high ceiling and cast a pinkish-gold light across the glossy black floor. The ricepaper walls are vertically striped in shades of mauve and cream, each lined with coralite hooks bearing various bows and crossbows. Narrow tables shoved into the corners display additional weapons available for purchase.

node.name: Killer Pinks, Define Outcomes
node.description: Lengths of peachy-pink spun glitter cover the room's walls, their metallic threads shimmering beautifully beneath the soft light cast by an ornate coralite chandelier hanging from the center of the room. Freestanding mannequins are artfully arranged across the bright pink floor to highlight their wares.

node.name: Shimmers of Silver
node.description: Despite the rather small confines of this long, narrow hall, careful attention has been given to the expensive-looking decorations. The white walls prominently showcase several small glass windows that look into elegant sculptures of colored glass, and bright lighting in the ceiling of their small cabinets shines onto the the works of art.

node.name: A Knight at the Club, Entry
node.description: A few benches along the walls provide seating for those who need a break from shopping. Warm light from the hanging brass chandelier spreads throughout the entry, making the polished oak floors gleam.

node.name: A Knight at the Club, Outerwear
node.description: Spread out around the room are wooden racks and stands displaying a wide variety of outerwear. Rushing salesclerks move about, answering questions and restocking clothing.

node.name: A Knight at the Club, Legwear
node.description: Piles of clothing are stacked up on shelves and counters, ready for purchase by customers. Smiling clerks answer questions and help the buyers with their other requirements.

node.name: A Knight at the Club, Doublets and Shirts
node.description: Garments hang from the racks and stands around the room, their colorful fabrics and trims dazzling to the eye. Cheerful salespeople roam about, ready to answer questions or get a different item from the stockroom.

node.name: A Knight at the Club, Jewelry
node.description: Glass cases and cabinets along the walls offer up jewelry and other adornments for perusal and purchase. Several armed guards stand in the corners, their gimlet eyes keeping the customers under watch to prevent theft.

node.name: A Knight at the Club, Accessories
node.description: A long walnut counter displays accessories and other extras for purchase. A few bins and baskets on the floor provide extra display space for further items.

node.name: A Knight at the Club, Gowns and Robes
node.description: Long racks of robes and gowns line the walls, their wooden poles almost groaning under the weight of the merchandise. The quiet murmur of voices fills the air as customers debate their purchases.

node.name: Carpin Capers, Main Room
node.description: Colorful walls in all the shades of the rainbow hold a few shelves with merchandise. Hanging from the rafters are a number of bells made of different metals and finishes. Several lanterns also hang from the rafters, providing illumination for the entire room.

node.name: The Future is Now, Armillary Sphere
node.description: Contained within the gargantuan iron sphere that forms this chamber are dozens of massive brass rings connected to a globe via a thick central axis. Ceaselessly, the rings twirl and spin about in silent harmony, no two plotting the same course. Prominently featured upon each is a limelight which collectively casts a multihued kaleidoscope of illumination about the room. A particularly wide ring slowly plots a course that offers customers a relatively safe path between the entrance and exit of the shop proper.

node.name: Hashal's Haven
node.description: Surprisingly roomy and well appointed, the interior of the tent is draped in lavish tapestries embroidered with elaborate arabesques in shimmering gold thread. Gilded lanterns illuminate the many fine wares, while a burly S'Kra guard keeps a watchful eye on patrons.

node.name: Tick Tock, Sales Floor
node.description: From behind a counter, a clerk carefully cleans fingerprints and other smudges from the wares proudly displayed throughout the small room. A shadesatin-lined tray of fancy clockwork devices is set on a counter between a black bust and some alerce pegs showcasing similar mechanical creations. Metal keys matching the various gadgets hang from some aldamdin hooks.

node.name: Which Craft, Sitting Room
node.description: A crooked brick fireplace stands against a stone-textured wall, cold and bare except for an empty cauldron inside. The area in front of the fireplace is dominated by a large, dusty floral-patterned sofa and an area rug, covered in ruddy stains. Light flickers from a twisted iron chandelier above, hanging precariously from a nearly broken chain. Everything is draped with a fine veil of cobwebs, with the exception of the goods for sale.

node.name: Which Craft, Kitchen
node.description: A large, sooty brick oven dominates the majority of the east wall, lit from the inside with a white-hot glow. A rough iron counter stands in the middle of the room, covered with pits and ruddy stains.

node.name: Which Craft, Experimentation Chamber
node.description: A large marble platform, draped in chains and ruddy stains, stands in the middle of the room. Locks of all shapes and sizes cover the walls, while a spiral chain chandelier hangs overhead.

node.name: Which Craft, Conservatory
node.description: The west wall is treated to resemble a glass, overlooking a mural of a graveyard with a full moon above. A spiral vine decorated with several vials of multicolored liquid hangs overhead.

node.name: Which Craft, Bed Chamber
node.description: A false window painted with a full moon against a backdrop of silvery stars takes up the majority of one wall. The area in front of the window is dominated by a large, lumpy bed with spiral-carved ivy posts. Opposite the bed stands a slender wardrobe, wrapped in chains.

node.name: Whimsies
node.description: As customers enter this brightly lit shop, ribbons and bells sway, and jingle as the door opens and closes. Along its fine oak walls is fanciful coralite furniture piled with goods for sale.

node.name: Wrath of the Storm, Salesroom
node.description: Dark grey banners hang on the indigo walls, portraying choppy seas tossing about a hapless ship. The floor is painted a slate-blue, the same shade as a storm-tossed sea. Gaethzen orbs dimly light the small room, casting an eerie and muted glow throughout the cramped space.

node.name: Floors for Thought, Main Salesfloor
node.description: Metal racks with rollout shelves line the walls, each shelf displaying a different sample of floor covering for perusal. Windows high in the walls provide lighting during daylight hours, with hanging gaethzen globes available during evening hours.

node.name: Floors for Thought, Refined Tastes
node.description: In contrast to the main salesfloor, the racks in this room are crafted from the finest tropical hardwoods. The flooring in the room is plain ash planking, but of such a fine finish that it is like walking on satin. Leaded glass clerestory windows allow in clear sunlight to aid the patrons in their selections.

node.name: The Haunted House, Front Hall
node.description: Dark red candles burn in small braziers on either side of the arched doorway, the myriad of rugs spread across the floor awash with the eerie light. Several chests line the sides of the small room, watchful eyes painted above them on the completely black walls. Shadows run deep in every corner, relentlessly assaulting the imagination with images of childhood monsters.

node.name: The Haunted House, Study
node.description: Standing in a battle-ready position with both hands gripped on their swords, a row of empty plate armor lines the northern wall, which is hung with moth-eaten purple drapes. On the southern side of the room, a skeletal horse with a fleshless knight mounted on its back is poised toward the armor, making the only path to the wares pass directly in the line of fire of both sides. Thin floorboards have been painted a dull grey, doing little to hide the extensive wear and tear.

node.name: The Haunted House, Bedroom
node.description: Very little light filters through boarded-up windows, covered in webs thick with the dried corpses of black widow spiders. Antique at best and sinister at worst, the furniture lining the room is neatly laid out, though much of it is difficult to make out in the dim light. Treacherous holes in the floor have been precariously patched over with thin boards, offering little safety.

node.name: The Haunted House, Kennel
node.description: Several cages are dimly visible in the poorly lit room, their doors tightly bolted. Shining eyes blink out from the darkness, some natural and some seeming otherworldly, glowing red and standing out in the darkness. A low brazier burns in the corner of the room, doing little to chase away the oppressive shadows.

node.name: The Haunted House, Attic
node.description: The cramped room resembles a large crawlspace underneath a peaked roof, with the sharply slanted ceiling intersecting the floor on the eastern side. Muted light filters in through a frosted window, illuminating dust motes floating through the air. Cobwebs clutter every corner of the small room and drape over dreary pieces of furniture.

node.name: Sheepish Shep's Ship-shape Sheep Ship Shop, Sales
node.note: Sheepish Shep's Ship-shape Sheep Ship Shop Sheesh
node.description: The plush wool tent walls are woven from undyed wool, giving the fabric a mottled look as the different shades of white and cream yarn were combined in the weaving process. A few paintings of nautical themes grace the walls while wooden shelves display the extremely eclectic stock of the shop.

node.name: Tea For Tamsine, Entrance
node.description: The entrance to this well-lit shop is framed in soft curtains of petalette, the shimmery rose-hued fabric complements the ivory and gold floral pattern that covers the walls. A small table rests next to the small hearth burning brightly in the center of the room, while a gilded drink cart sits in the corner.

node.name: Tea For Tamsine, Tea Time
node.description: The faintest whiff of oranges and black tea drifts in to the brightly lit room, the pleasant smell matching the room's interior. Polished cherry floorboards look clean enough to eat off of, not that the proprietor would recommend doing so. A broad black walnut kitchen counter takes up one wall, while a pair of lacquered tables sit in the far corner.

node.name: Tea For Tamsine, Kitchy Kitchens
node.description: The majority of the floor is covered by a grey and white chevron-striped rug, but along the edges of the room it's possible to make out the polished cherry boards gleaming below. An assortment of kitchen furniture is placed around the brightly lit room, each set to show off the fine craftsmanship that went into its creation.

node.name: The Musiceum, Orchestral Manoeuvres
node.description: Dark sable velvet drapery has been hung from ceiling to wall, swathing the room in near blackness. The darkness is staved off completely by several gaethzen globes hung by near invisible wire that have been carefully positioned over the display cases to allow the wares for sale to be seen clearly. Nestled between the swathes of cloth, cases and instrument tools have been hung on pegboards to show them off to their best advantage.

node.name: The Musiceum, Amber Room
node.description: Set up in an octagonal shape, this room has been fitted with amber panels throughout. Behind each panel, light has been set up to allow the amber to glow like a warm fire as well as highlighting the tiny bubbles and animals trapped within. Ornate gold hardware secures each panel to the next, blending almost seamlessly with the tawny-hue of the paneling. Three gaethzen globes suspend above the empty room, while a large hanging sign has been strung up to rest immediately below the middle globe.

node.name: Haute Dogs and Fat Cats, Salesroom
node.note: Haute Dogs and Fat Cats|Hot Dogs|Fat Cats
node.description: The canvas walls are covered with murals of dogs jumping and playing while cats slumber on windowsills and chairs. Brightly painted shelves and counters display the products for sale while the sales staff circulates to answer questions and make sales.

node.name: Focus on the Past, Relic Room
node.description: Several soil-stained packing crates stacked along the back encroach towards the interior at random intervals, detracting from the otherwise orderly desk where recent finds are cataloged. Various shelves and bookcases occupy much of the remaining space, holding artifacts marked and tagged from previous expeditions. A slight mustiness lingers in the air, infusing the room with the dampness imagined held within the tomb or temple where these artifacts originated.

node.name: Too Much of a Good Sling, Salesroom
node.note: Too Much of a Good Sling|Slings
node.description: Canvas tent walls enclose a bare spot of ground, with little beyond some baskets and bins scattered about to show that this is a shop selling merchandise. A lantern hangs from the tent pole and provides some illumination throughout the cramped space.

node.name: The Other Siegery Shop
node.description: Elaborate tapestries hang from the four walls in colorful banners. Each is decorated with an army marching over fields and meadows, ready to clash with an opposing army on the opposite banner. Incandescent lights hang from the ceiling, illuminating numerous tables filled with miniature figures and a lone shelf with sets for sale.

node.name: The Other Siegery Shop, Team Gear
node.description: Elaborate tapestries hang from the four walls in colorful banners. Each is decorated with an army marching over fields and meadows, ready to clash with an opposing army on the opposite banner. Incandescent lights hang from the ceiling, illuminating the various sales surfaces.

node.name: Fishy's Pants Mart, Pants Department of Pants
node.description: Scorch marks festoon the inside walls of this tent as if someone had run amok with a torch, or perhaps there were several small explosions. A mild sulfurous odor hangs in the air with an underlying hint of old fish. All this combined with the bright colors of the displays, however, might lead one to suspect that the proprietor is not a reserved or, indeed, stable individual.

node.name: Fishy's Pants Mart, Pants Department of Not-Pants
node.description: This side room is a bit shabby and unadorned, as if it were an afterthought. The tent walls show less obvious damage than those in the main section, although the general aroma is similar. Stray fragments of fabric litter the floor here and there.

node.name: Bathed in Splendor, Submerged
node.description: Enclosed within water-filled glass walls, the shop is surrounded by a school of brightly colored tetras and a trio of tiny marbled-shell turtles as they dart through clusters of blue-green waterferns that rise from a bed of silvery sand.

node.name: Stitched by the Sea, Sewing Room
node.description: Decorated with delicate strings of gaethzen seashells that criss-cross a vaulted ceiling, the spacious room is filled with light that streams in from large stained glass windows depicting panoramic seascapes at each corner. The comfortable sewing space has a variety of counters and a large bobbin cabinet pushed up against the walls to leave the center of the room easy to navigate.

node.name: All Gallows Eve, Salesfloor
node.description: The dark, almost dreary, room is lit by a few skull-shaped sconces on the dark brown walls. The main counter is shaped like a gallows, with a noose hanging over the locked cash box. Carrying the morbid theme further, most of the merchandise is displayed on several coffin-shaped racks, stands, displayes, and shelves scattered throughout the room.

node.name: Natural Selections, On Your Guard
node.description: Skulls of strange creatures and beasts hang overhead from pieces of sinew, each one free of any remnants of their previous owners. Various furs are splayed along the floor, cushioning the footfalls of visitors into the room. Painted upon the walls are depictions of conquests and adventures within the wilds of the lands.

node.name: Natural Selections, Fang and Claw
node.description: Furs are littered about the floor, hiding only portions of the metal floor. Overhead, an oil lantern brightens the area and provides light for a tapestry that covers the wall. Adjacent to the tapestry is a small, well cared for tree planted in a ceramic pot.

node.name: Natural Selections, Below the Belt
node.description: Figurines depicting various scenes of violence sit on a small end table beside the metal wall. Attached to a metal bolt is a lantern that puts the products for sale under bright light. Several skins have been placed on the ground, cushioning customers' feet from the bare metal flooring.

node.name: Katy Gore The Door, Sales Area
node.description: Deep shadows linger in the corners where the fitful lighting does not quite reach. Racks spread around the room display the doors for sale.

node.name: The Emperor's New Robes, Outlet
node.description: Lofty tentpoles hold up the striped roof which soars overhead. Multi-hued bands of silk run vertically along the walls, making the interior a riot of color even without the kaleidoscopic hues of the merchandise. Racks and stands display the wares on offer while salesclerks bustle about.

node.name: Only The Holy, Salesfloor
node.description: Frescos depicting the Immortals cover the wall, each depicted with their symbols and animals. The exposed roof beams have been carved into a running frieze of holy symbols, leaving no surface undecorated. In contrast to the roof beams, the racks and shelves displaying the merchandise are of plain wood.

node.name: Jynli's Cattery HE Wing, Main Room
node.description: Large spacious cages line the walls, each outfitted with a comfortable bed and a scratching post as well as full water and food bowls. Behind the mesh, each cage displays one of the exotic cats that Jynli is known for. The pets are mostly sleeping, but a few stare boldly out at the customers wandering around.

node.name: Pita Pan, Mainroom
node.description: Plain walls enclose a mostly bare room with just a counter for the salesclerks and a large table displaying the wares. A few lamps provide subdued lighting in line with the minimalist feel of the shop's fixtures.

node.name: All The King's Men, Entrance
node.description: Opulent tapestries ring the walls of the spacious vestibule, while thick plush rugs blanket the gleaming wooden floors. Low benches of polished deobar wood flank the entry flap. One lone table stands in the middle of the carpeted floor, a branching candelabra positioned carefully on a pristine white tablecloth.

node.name: All The King's Men, Shirts
node.description: Silken gauze curtains dyed in jewel-tones partition the interior of the tent into smaller sections. Surrounding this section are delicate drapes in pale blue-greens the color of aquamarines. Gleaming white ash racks and tables hold brilliantly colored wares.

node.name: All The King's Men, Pants
node.description: Opulent rugs of thick wool completely cover the ground, allowing patrons to browse in comfort. Folded pants are stacked on the aromatic cedarwood tables and counters. Wispy curtains of translucent emerald-green silk screen the area from the rest of the tent.

node.name: All The King's Men, Shoes
node.description: Burnished lunat wood stands and racks stand in the center of a midnight blue wool rug covering the matching plank floor. Shoes and boots in a myriad of styles grace the polished surfaces. Wispy draperies dyed a deep sapphire blue section the area off from the rest of the tent.

node.name: All The King's Men, Cloaks
node.description: Intricately figured cocobolo wood racks and wardrobes display a profusion of brilliantly colored wares. Amber-colored sheer silken drapes delineate the section of the tent devoted to cloaks and other outerwear. Deep yellow wool pile carpets muffle all sounds of movement.

node.name: All The King's Men, Doublets
node.description: Fine-grained teak shelves and stands set out the luxurious offerings on sale. Wispy fabric drapes the shade of watermelon tourmaline help to section off this area from the rest of the commodious tent. Flooring of dark teak covers the floor, its surface almost totally concealed beneath the fuchsia-colored plush carpets.

node.name: All The King's Men, Hats
node.description: Plush pile carpets dyed in swirls of white and light purple cover the floor, hiding the waxed wood from view. Thin amethyst-colored silken curtains isolate the space from the remainder of the tent. Hats are piled in profusion on polished rowan wood tables and stands.

node.name: The Finer Things, Front Room
node.description: The room is lavishly floored with durian buffed to a brilliant sheen while a perfume bottle chandelier hangs from above illuminating the opulent coral walls with a warm glow. A shelf of brushed platinum faces an intricately carved chest, each carefully placed to subtly catch the light upon their showcased wares. Taking the central focal point of the room is a glass counter wrapped in strands of seashells and adorned with purposely placed jars of brightly glowing gaethzen.

node.name: The Finer Things, Back Room
node.description: The opulence of the shop is carried into this room, but with a more casual setting. Sun bleached coral walls are draped in pastel-tinted whisperlayne interwoven with soft glowing lights that help to highlight the salt-stained durian floors. Reclaimed wood and expensive fabrics combine to create the chests and whitewashed shelves used to display the wares in the cozy area.

node.name: The Finer Things, Corner
node.description: The lush, ocean-blue carpeting of the small room serves the dual purposes of muffling the sounds of heavy foot traffic and providing a more cushioned place to sit or stand. Lavish piles of sea-shell patterned pillows are stacked with an eye to detail and the customers' comfort in mind. Potted palm trees strung with softly glowing sungold lanterns stand in each corner of the room, giving off just enough light to create a relaxed ambience.

node.name: Field Fashion, Not-Really-Skirts
node.description: Palm fronds cover the walls, providing partial cover from the elements. The raised floor is sanded teak planks which support a variety of racks and stands for the merchandise.

node.name: Field Fashion, Things That Are Still Not Skirts
node.description: Tucked into the back of the cabana is this airy room with large open screened windows. A few shelves and racks showcase the items for sale.

node.name: Field Fashion, Long Things That Might Trip You
node.description: Instead of palm frond walls, the room is enclosed with louvered panels that help to keep the elements out without impeding air flow. The merchandise is displayed on counters and tables.

node.name: In Gore Pouch, Inside Tent
node.description: Shelves and racks run along the hide walls of the tent, set there to display the merchandise without impeding the flow of customers. A few clerks circulate through the crowds as they restock the wares and answer questions about the stock. Gleaming gaethzen spheres hang from the tent poles and illuminate the corners with bright light.

node.name: Urn Back Time, Front Room
node.description: A framework of oak poles holds up the canvas sides, which are decorated with painted designs in red and black depicting people in flowing clothes marching in procession. A few lanterns hanging from the roofpoles provide lighting for the shop's wares displayed on the wooden shelves and racks about the area.

node.name: Urn Back Time, Back Room
node.description: A framework of oak poles holds up the canvas sides, which are decorated with painted designs in red and black depicting people in long robes parading through a city street. A few lanterns hanging from the roofpoles provide lighting for the shop's wares displayed on the wooden shelves and racks about the area.

node.name: Sew It Seems, Entrance
node.description: Cheerful yellow walls provide a welcoming entrance to this inviting shop. Various seating options are available to allow the patrons to rest between buying sprees.

node.name: Sew It Seems, Clothing
node.description: Racks of pants in various shades, grouped by color onto correspondingly painted displays, fill the central area of this room. Shelves, likewise arranged by color, are set along the walls and sell shirts in a wide array of colors.

node.name: Sew It Seems, Footwear
node.description: Several racks of boots are grouped next to plain benches where patrons can try on their prospective purchases. Each rack is painted in colors to match the merchandise on offer for that display.

node.name: Sew It Seems, Adventuring Gear
node.description: The entire room is filled with stands overflowing with backpacks, rucksacks, and knapsacks. Each stand is a different color, and the items on display for each stand are various shades of the stand's color. Busy clerks keep the merchandise stocked.

node.name: Sew It Seems, Outerwear
node.description: Scattered about the room are differently colored cloak racks, each carrying an assortment of outerwear in matching shades. Sales clerks bustle about keeping the displays stocked.

node.name: Fabric Fantasies, Salesroom
node.description: Lengths of assorted colorful and luxurious fabrics cover the room's dingy walls, allowing customers closer inspection of the exquisite goods sold at this location. Large gaethzen spheres dangle from the ceiling, washing the area in bright light, which causes metallic threads and gem flecks in certain displayed textiles to sparkle like crystals on a summer's day. Pale beige carpeting covers the floor, hiding the building's metal partitions from hurried shoppers.

node.name: Looty Booty, Entrance
node.description: Plain birch walls circumscribe the room, lacking any embellishment or adornment. A square doorway leads further into the shop, while a simple chain dangling from the ceiling holds a gaethzen sphere that illuminates the sparse alcove.

node.name: Things That Go Bump in the Fight, Control Room
node.note: Things That Go Bump in the Fight|Bump in the Fight
node.description: Set up in the middle of the floor are a number of utilitarian shelves and racks made of wood. A few small cubicles are set up along the canvas tent walls so that patrons can try on the merchandise. The scent of oiled canvas and freshly cut wood still drifts on the air in the confined space.

node.name: Sputkin's Splendors, Entry
node.description: Decoration is sparse in the entryway. A cramped passage leads northward between stacks of empty crates, whose contents are presumably on display elsewhere.

node.name: Sputkin's Splendors, Nexus
node.description: This chamber is the most spacious in the wagon, providing ample room for a crowd to attend a sermon. A high white marble altar rises majestically in the middle of the room, flanked by tall silver candlesticks which cast a nimbus of warm light across its pale surface. Shallow alcoves surround the chamber, branching off in all directions.

node.name: Sputkin's Splendors, Small Alcove
node.description: Soft black velvet tapestries drape the walls of this alcove, bathed in the light of a single candle held from an ornate platinum floor sconce.

node.name: Sputkin's Splendors, Small Alcove
node.description: Deep blue watersilk tapestries cascade down the walls, shimmering in the light of an ornate silver lantern suspended from the ceiling. The play of color and light against the fabric gives the cramped alcove a spurious illusion of spaciousness.

node.name: Sputkin's Splendors, Small Alcove
node.description: This small alcove has been draped in pearlescent white silken tapestries. Several large candles held in delicate white-gold floor sconces bathe the area in a gentle glow, causing the tapestries to shimmer beneath the soft caress of the flickering candlelight.

node.name: Sputkin's Splendors, Small Alcove
node.description: A bizarre mix of gaudiness and subtlety, festive banners adorn one side of this small alcove while plain white cotton tapestries mask the other wall. A simple iron lantern sways from the ceiling, bathing the area in its glow.

node.name: Sputkin's Splendors, Cramped Loft
node.description: Not a single cobweb mars this small loft, allowing a feeling of comfort to permeate throughout. A single candle rises from a golden floor sconce, casting playfully dancing shadows on the walls.

node.name: Farhana's Island Exquisites, Sales Room
node.description: Arched walls are hung with ivory gauze layered over pale rose silk, softening the light of the room and rippling with every breeze. Tall seagrass baskets filled with honeysuckle blossoms and curls of sandalwood and cinnamon bark are tucked in the corners, lending a light and spicy fragrance to the air. Big cushions covered with raw silk and edged with tiny golden bells are scattered near the merchandise racks, inviting shoppers to linger and choose.

node.name: Kilt From Scratch, Shop
node.description: Although the mortar between the bricks is a bit crumbly, the walls are stout and solid. Counters and shelves display the products for sale, while the busy salespeople bustle about helping customers and replenishing merchandise.

node.name: Jousting Grounds, Lances and Roses Souvenir Shop
node.description: Dolls, ribands and other souvenirs are laid out in neat groups atop the display tables in the shop. Sales clerks work quickly to maintain the order as items are snatched up by prize-hungry spectators attending the competitions.

node.name: Artistry of Flesh
node.description: The room is low and cell-like, an excess of gaethzen orbs hanging from the ceiling filling the small space with a harsh, sterile light. The only piece of furniture is a large reclining chair bearing a range of gadgets both mundane and alien. Samples of flash cover the far wall, the only break from the dull grey wood. A thin young Kaldaran man, presumably the artist, stands rigidly out of the way with a flat expression.

node.name: Artistry of Flesh, Side Room
node.description: Gaethzen orbs hang from the ceiling and fill this small room with harsh white light, illuminating the sterile space and its lack of decorations. A small table pushed up against the back wall is covered in a mound of crumpled papers and mangled trinkets, remnants from an unknown project. Nestled amongst unwanted items is a small catalog.

node.name: Dying to Shop, Front of Tent
node.description: Black canvas walls have a few openings that allow air and light to come into this large tent. Fresh grass mats cover the ground while various displays hold the merchandise for sale. A large white banner hangs between the tentpoles.

node.name: Dying to Shop, Back of Tent
node.description: Black canvas walls have a few openings that allow air and light to come into this large tent. Fresh grass mats cover the ground while various displays hold the merchandise for sale. A large white banner hangs overhead.

node.name: Knotty Pirate, Entry
node.description: Plain oak paneling covers the walls with rich, yellow-brown wood while the floors are narrower planks of the same wood. Occupying the central space of the entry is a tall mannequin, dressed in a flamboyant outfit.

node.name: Dark Dalliance, Chamber
node.description: A hint of perfume upon the air greets all who enter this merchant. The area is mostly dark, with just a hint of candlelight dancing against the stark obsidian walls. Merchandise rests upon dark furniture lining each side while a massive throne offers seating at the back.

node.name: The Ghostly Galleria of Spiritual Souvenirs
node.description: The unmistakable salty tang of the sea hangs heavily in the air. The small room sits at a slight angle, as a bulky crate would lean with a heavy load stacked atop it. The ceiling on one side is higher than the other. Despite the structure's physical condition, a fresh coat of white paint covers the walls, and a royal purple rug -- still curled at its edges -- sits in the center.

node.name: Nigeyi's, Purveyor of Fine Footwear
node.description: Various displays, each catering to the different tastes of Nigeyi's customers, line the room. Suspended from the ceiling are wagon wheels upon which lit candles brighten the room and cast dancing shadows whenever the door opens. A worn stool and cobbler's form sit in the corner beneath a rack holding a neat assortment of tools.

node.name: Nigeyi's, Selections
node.description: Tapered candles fill the center of the small room with bright light, throwing dusky shadows against a small sign hanging from a wagon wheel in the corner.

node.name: Nigeyi's Resale
node.description: Deliberately darker than the other rooms, items consigned to this space have been rehabilitated, but no one has appeared to pay for the service. Long abandoned by their owners, they accumulate dust as Nigeyi attempts to recoup his labor and expenses.

node.name: Makeshift Killing Supplies Annex, Shop
node.description: Crafted of rough wooden boards cobbled together with rusted nails, this wagon looks as though it's ready to fall apart. Wares are displayed in the center of the room, where they are slightly less likely to be attacked by the termites that infest the mobile shop.

node.name: Soulful Trinkets
node.description: Lamps are placed around the room haphazardly, offering just enough light to clearly view the merchandise for sale here. White cloth covers the dark metal walls in an attempt to further brighten the area. Three racks are strategically placed around the room, their colors signifying the sort of aspects the wares on them represent.

node.name: Ritual Addiction, Ceremony
node.description: Smooth leather walls of overlaid straps with silver studs rise up around a dark haon floor. Dim sconces cast irregular shadows across the room, revealing a collection of haphazardly arranged tables.

node.name: Ritual Addiction, Strife
node.description: Smooth leather walls of overlaid straps with silver studs rise up around a dark haon floor. Dim sconces cast irregular shadows across the room, revealing a collection of haphazardly arranged tables.

node.name: Reinventing the Wheel, Entry
node.description: The aromas of hay and wood are very strong in the small entryway. Rough cedar planks, comprising the shop's floor, creak beneath the movements of customers. Two small bales of hay have been used to anchor a large wagon wheel on its end across from the entrance.

node.name: Reinventing the Wheel, West Room
node.description: Two circular display boards, painted to resemble wagon wheels, have been mounted upon the walls. Various images of available merchandise have been placed within the spokes of each display.

node.name: Galleria of Garters
node.description: Elegant gold lanterns glow softly from their perches high above the sales floor. Bolts of vibrant silk drape from the corner posts and airily drift towards the floor. Adjacent to the fabric walls reside pieces of richly polished mahogany furniture which double as displays.

node.name: The Lost Tavern
node.description: Dark and gloomy, the atmosphere reflects the abandoned appearance of the area. Four dingy, vine-covered walls hide faded messages, once legible and now covered in dust and unreadable, while unlit torches are attached to the rounded wooden beams that support the tall roof of this forgotten building. Small windows covered with dust and grim line the wall above a vine-covered display case. Scattered around the large room are tables covered with various bottles in a variety of sizes. A small bar stands next to the dilapidated door.

node.name: In The Hollow
node.description: A cold draft wafts through the room at regular intervals, its source undetermined. Each passing breeze causes the hooks hanging from the rafters to sway, making the ribbons and papers decorating the pinatas they hold flutter with eerie sounds. A small table set to one side contains additional beribboned items.

node.name: Delicate Creations
node.description: Pale blooms of fragrant flowers are interspersed throughout this small shop. The oak-paneled walls are softened by crystal sconces and ivory tapestries. Simply clad clerks appear ready to help customers with fine clothing hung on racks and set out on tables.

node.name: Conductive Contraptions, Sales Floor
node.description: A lamp of caged lightning churns with a harsh white illumination, and the air is heavily charged, smelling faintly of ozone. Crates of inventory overflowing with wool packing material line the back wall, and several sconces burn with crackling fires to dry the air. Shelves bearing dishes of ground charcoal line the perimeter of the room.

node.name: Tastelessly Tacky, Vestibule
node.description: Crystals encrusted on the walls glitter in the warm glow of the candelabra resting on the white harpsichord positioned in the center of the room. Next to the instrument is a mannequin dressed in a dazzlingly white ensemble. A pure white wool rug, its plush pile thick and luxurious, covers the ground.

node.name: Tastelessly Tacky, Pointy Things
node.description: Plum-colored watered silk covers the upper walls over a wainscotting of cherrywood. Matching planks form the floor which peeks out beneath the numerous sheepskins scattered about as carpets. Wildly painted weapon stands and armor racks display the wares for sale.

node.name: Tastelessly Tacky, Clothing
node.description: Pink painted walls enclose a wooden floor stained purple. A bright blue table stands in the middle of the room, displaying various clothing items for sale, with an orange and purple painted chest next to it.

node.name: Tastelessly Tacky, Containers
node.description: Fake leopard-print wallpaper covers the walls, clashing with the zebra-skin rugs on the black and white checked wooden floor. A counter, covered with red dyed fur, holds containers for sale.

node.name: Tieheq with the Thirteen, Vestibule
node.description: Overlapping panels of starlight velvet drape from the ceiling, loosely defining the circular shop. Dominating the center of the chamber is a pure white marble monument of Misiumos.

node.name: Tieheq with the Thirteen, Vestments
node.description: Overlapping panels of starlight velvet drape from the ceiling, loosely defining the circular shop. Dominating the center of the chamber is a pure white marble monument of Misiumos.

node.name: Tieheq with the Thirteen, Iconography
node.description: Overlapping panels of starlight velvet drape from the ceiling, loosely defining the circular shop. Dominating the center of the chamber is a pure white marble monument of Misiumos.

node.name: Tieheq with the Thirteen, Accouterments
node.description: Overlapping panels of starlight velvet drape from the ceiling, loosely defining the circular shop. Dominating the center of the chamber is a pure white marble monument of Misiumos.

node.name: Halberdashery, Main Room
node.description: Whitewashed walls enclose the simply furnished shop. A plain pine counter in one corner is matched by the wooden weapon racks displaying the goods for sale. Overhead some gaethzen spheres provide illumination.

node.name: Down on the Farm, Salesroom
node.description: Small pens and paddocks are set up on the floor, each one filled with tiny animals munching on fodder. The space overloads the senses with the sounds and smells of a barnyard as the attendents rush around trying to simultaneously help the customers and care for the pets on offer.

node.name: Rite of Cravat, Salesfloor
node.description: Sturdy brickwork forms the walls around the shop, the bright red of the masonry contrasting with the pale color of the mortar. Elegant brass sconces hold beeswax candles that illuminate the area with a bright clear light. Polished wood shelves hold the merchandise while the cheerful clerks stand ready to assist in any way.

node.name: Svenblum's Annex, Inner Child
node.description: The soothing scent of cedar fills the room while oil lanterns fill the area with brightness. In the center of the room is a black walnut burl that appears to be a makeshift workstation. Various shaping tools, knives, and wood shavings clutter the burl. Flanking it are some wooden benches with items for sale.

node.name: Svenblum's Annex, Play Corner
node.description: This corner of the wagon appears to have been designed with a child in mind. Some wooden shelves filled with woodcarvings line the walls while a small reed basket nests in multi-colored throw pillows. A small teak burl sits in the middle of the area with an unpainted doll house resting on top.

node.name: Svenblum's Annex, Cubbyhole
node.description: The main embellishment in this shadowy corner of the workroom is a standing silverwillow burl. An overhead lantern provides just enough light to view the various wooden shelves on the walls.

node.name: Dress for Success, Salesfloor
node.description: Sturdy walls of cut grey limestone are topped by large wooden beams supporting the roof. A few lanterns hang from the roofbeams, illuminating the spacious room and the mannequins displaying the shop's merchandise.

node.name: Raw Silk, Shopfloor
node.description: Tall stands and racks scattered around the shop exhibit the product while keeping the delicate fabrics off the floor. The bustle of the clerks as they circulate about mingles with the chatter of the patrons to create a constant background noise.

node.name: Stabbaticals, Sales Floor
node.description: Billowy white banners are draped along the walls, framing the wooden pegs and hooks affixed at even intervals around the room. A trio of tables rests upon a dark blue rug stretched over the polished oak floor. Running along the back wall is an intricate mural of a battlefield strewn with broken weaponry and fallen bodies.

node.name: Divine Design, Shop
node.description: Felt panels are placed over a framework of slender rods that rise in a dome. Appliques of the many symbols of the gods cover the walls, while the floor is made up of finely polished oak planks laid in a circular pattern radiating from the center. Wooden shelves hold the merchandise on offer.

node.name: Home for the Fireplace, Showroom
node.description: Exhibited back to back in the center of the room are a number of displays of the various fireplaces available in the shop. More are set against the paneled walls.

node.name: Creature Story, Sales
node.description: Painted in garish colors spanning all the walls is a mural depicting hundreds of creatures from Elanthia -- from arbelogs to zombies. Centered in the middle of the oak floor are a number of wooden stands, each one made from a different wood. The stands display a variety of merchandise, tastefully arranged on velvet-padded arms extending from the stands.

node.name: Wedding Belles, Foyer
node.description: A sense of lightness and elegance pervades the room, helped by the richness of the ivory silk-covered walls. Silver sconces jut out from the walls, holding candles out from polished reflectors. A small side table against one wall holds some refreshments, and white chairs stand against the two flanking walls.

node.name: Wedding Bells, With This Ring
node.description: Subtle but bright lighting ensures that the clientele of this shop can properly appreciate the exquisite merchandise on offering. Pale birch paneling along the walls adds to the general feeling of light and warmth. Three display cases - trimmed in teak, ebony, and cherry - hold pride of place in the center of the salesfloor.

node.name: Wedding Bells, Dapper Designs
node.description: Deeply padded leather armchairs provide spots for lounging and resting before further shopping. Dark wood paneling of various woods run vertically along the walls to the white plasterwork of the ceiling. Large chandeliers dangle from the ceiling, illuminating the tables placed in the center of the room.

node.name: Wedding Bells, Bridal Suite
node.description: Instead of wood, the walls are covered in an off-white silk with a subtle shifting pattern of moire watermarks. A tri-fold mirror stands in one corner while mannequins garbed in luscious fabrics display the shop's bridal wares. Delicate lamps scattered throughout the area provide copious illumination of the designs and details.

node.name: Wedding Belles, Artful Accouterments
node.description: Lit chandeliers provide light now that night has descended, illuminating the cream-colored walls and pale pine floor planking. Mannequins stand in various poses in one corner. Large floor to ceiling mirrors allow for the trying on of the merchandise before purchasing.

node.name: Lute The Room, Mainroom
node.description: Exotic woods and odd metals are heaped in and on containers throughout this cramped shop. A workbench, littered with tools, testifies that each instrument is handcrafted with care. A table stands near the door, displaying what's available for purchase.

node.name: Scentsations, Sweet Senses
node.description: Pure white walls enclose the airy confines of the sales floor. Faint scents waft through the area, a bouquet of mingled aromas that blends into an overall impression of pleasure and delight. Across one wall stands a counter, its plain ash wood unrelieved by any ornamentation.

node.name: Scentsations, Functionally Fragrant
node.description: Heavy, almost overpowering scents dominate the room, each one warring with the other for preeminence. Besides a tall white counter, there is little in the room to distract from the overwhelming cacophony of scents that pervades the area. Spread across the display are the numerous bottles and vials of the shop's merchandise.

node.name: Scentsations, Seasonal Scents
node.description: Thin black stripes alternate with wide white planks in the floor, set diagonally to the walls which are an austure white without any decoration. Hints of wintergreen, pumpkins, roses, and strawberries drift through the air, each new scent bringing memories of seasons long past. A long white counter stands in the center of the room, featuring the exquisite wares of the shop.

node.name: Scentsations, Once and Floral
node.description: Tiles on the floor form a stylized floral design in black and white with the same blossom theme repeated on the carved baseboards and crown moulding of the whitewashed walls. A plain birch counter stands against a wall, showing the shop's wares without any distractions from the furnishings.

node.name: Row Row Row Your Coat, Shop
node.note: Row Row Row Your Coat|Row Your Coat
node.description: Oilcloth walls devoid of decoration enclose the shop, the peaked roof upheld by long wooden poles. Simple stands and shelves are dispersed around the room, each strategically placed under a lantern hanging from the tentpoles. Clerks circulate throughout, always ready to answer a question or make a sale.

node.name: The Scorpion Shop, Salesroom
node.description: Finely polished ebony walls enclose the room, the narrow planking fitted so expertly together that is almost impossible to tell where the joints are. A deep grey carpet covers most of the flooring, an abstract pattern of lighter and darker areas the only variation in the rug. Bare metal shelves and racks display the shop's merchandise.

node.name: Sofa So Good, Salesroom
node.description: Spacious in extent, the room is floored with broad oak planking sanded smooth and then lacquered to protect the surface. Vertical oak paneling covers the otherwise undecorated walls. Sofas, divans, and other seating are displayed throughout the store, ready for purchase.

node.name: Skin Art by Jaecinda
node.description: The simple wagon lacks any significant decoration. The walls are bare wood, and large windows provide ample natural lighting while an ink-stained rug, likely once cream colored, covers most of the floor. A lone workspace exists for Jaecinda to do her work.

node.name: The Fighting is on the Wall, Salesfloor
node.description: Scuffed and scarred, the oak planks of the floor show the signs of heavy use. Wooden weapons hang on the walls, each one battered from heavy use before being retired to serve as decorations. A few stands and shelves display the merchandise.

node.name: Now And Trader, Salesfloor
node.description: Frames on the walls display drawings of the various customization options available, each one labeled with the basic information on the stock. Brightly polished brass lanterns hang from the ceiling, illuminating the plastered walls and well-swept floors.

node.name: The Contented Sole, Salesfloor
node.description: Giant appliqued fish are affixed to the canvas walls, cut from colorful felt and decorated with googly eyes. Paper lanterns shaped like various fish species hang from the tent poles, giving light to the room. Shelves and racks crowd the salesfloor, each one stuffed with a wide selection of footwear.

node.name: See the Light, Kermorian Divinity
node.description: Aurulent curtains are draped along the walls of lifesculpted coral, lending a majestic air to the space, while luxurious rugs muffle the sounds of footsteps and of conversations. Thirteen gilded lanterns provide ample illumination.

node.name: See the Light, Foreign Powers
node.description: Sanguine swathes accentuate the walls of lifesculpted coral, lending bursts of color to the space, while exotic rugs muffle the sounds of footsteps and of conversations. Several flickering torches illuminate the merchandise.

node.name: Excess Baggage, Salesroom
node.description: Panels of ethereal white fabric are draped across the ceiling and allowed to fall in waves to the floor, creating a bright, neutral backdrop for the displayed merchandise. Woven rugs hide the last bit of ground from the existing space as well as muffle the hurried footsteps of busy shoppers.

node.name: Eluned's Dreams in Flesh
node.description: The mother-of-pearl walls are a pristine white, reflecting light in iridescent swirls. Cabinets are stocked with dyes of every imaginable color and shade. Comfortable looking benches and stools are spaced about the room. Small tables are setup in the corners of the shop.

node.name: Red Fan Siegery Suppliers, Basalt Isle Room
node.description: Inside this poorly-constructed shack, a Merelew shopkeeper stands over a number of tiny figurines, idly carving on one and not particularly paying attention to you. A single gaethzen lamp swings idly from the ceiling, casting shadows across the room.

node.name: Rizadi's Outfitters, Sales Floor
node.description: Brass lanterns hang in each corner, spreading a warm glow over the well-tended merchandise and handsomely framed provincial maps that dot the varnished honey-pine walls. Rows of pewter, brass and copper hooks hang over the iron-banded oak chest that stands near a curtained alcove. An elaborate globe, inlaid with precious gemstones, rests on the centrally located polished walnut counter.

node.name: Piralpa Tridents, Coral Showroom
node.description: Sculpted in bas-relief, images of fish with childlike faces adorn the coral walls, their glassy gem eyes following any motion in the room due to tricks of light and shadow. The monotony of the rough walls is broken not only by these cheerful masques but by a series of thick colored bands, adding a rainbow of seafoam greens, ocean blues and pastel pinks to the otherwise pale coral room.

node.name: Piralpa Tridents, Shell Showroom
node.description: Shells from a variety of sea creatures turn the floor into a sparkling mosaic of iridescent color, a strong contrast to the dull beige shade of the walls. From the pale ceiling hang a few twisted ribbons of dried seaweed, suspending decorative bits of coral and stone to be reflected in the glossy and buffed surface of the floor.

node.name: The Future is Now, Workshop
node.note: Future is Now|The Future is Now
node.description: The once spacious workshop is cramped by mechanical flights of fantasy. Many are little more than carefully annotated blueprints, scattered springs and stray gears, while others proudly proclaim their completion with scribbled price tags. Some merchandise lies in tangles and piles of clutter, while others sprawl across the workbench, a side table, the assorted shelving and even the walls.

node.name: Gosling's Exotic Fish
node.description: Colorful fish dart amidst the greenery in a large tank along the far wall of the shop. Above the tank, water trickles from tier to tier down a roughly carved blue sandstone waterfall, finally tumbling into the tank. Light reflecting off the surface of the water sends flickering patterns dancing around the room.

node.name: Crimson Dragon Gaming, Sea Chamber
node.description: Crystal columns form a semicircle about a wall of glass that stretches along one side of the room and looks directly into the sea beneath the island. Schools of tiny phosphorescent fish dance and dart within the columns, creating shifting patterns of light throughout the chamber. The caller stands before the backdrop of ocean life that thrives a few feet away.

node.name: Looty Booty, Salesfloor
node.description: Glass-fronted wooden cabinets line the walls, their black velvet-covered shelves displaying the exquisite wares to a well-heeled clientele. The pale woods of the paneling and floor provide a sharp contrast to the plush ebony-hued shelving. Genteel salespeople unobtrusively wait to help the patrons with their selections.
